author: Staff Reporter
text:
A police constable is among the two men arrested by the city police on charges of trying to rob a shopkeeper near the Mint bridge on Basin Bridge Road last week.

Parameshwaran, the constable who was attached to Koyambedu police station, sources said, had tried to rob Abdul Rahim of Washermanpet of a bag of cash.

Parameshwaran was helped by his friend Jagan, police said.

They said that when Abdul Rahim called out for help, passers-by on the road managed to nab Jagan, while Parameshwaran managed to escape. Investigations revealed that Parameshwaran is wanted in an attempt to rob case. – Staff Reporter
title: Constable held for robbery attempt
